3: Lee! Please respond if you can hear me!
I can hear you, but it's not because of the communication but because my hearing has recovered...
What about your sight? Kamui, what do you see around you?
Anyway, let's find a way to reunite first.
If it was just interference with our senses, then we shouldn't be too far apart since it hasn't been long.
You're right... Wait, I think I touched something.
Oh, sorry... Commandant, how's your situation?
Commandant, you're touching my face... Looks like it's affecting Commandant, too.
But Commandant is fully human... Why would the interference work on the commandant as well?
Kamui still hasn't responded... Trying to connect with Babylonia failed as well.
If I'm not wrong... Lucia, Commandant, come with me.
